positionName: Market Research Analyst – Cybersecurity and Infrastructure
description: Canalys is looking for a Market Research Analyst to support our fast-growing and highly respected worldwide market intelligence services, used by the world’s leading technology companies. The successful applicant will be based in our Bengaluru, India office and will be responsible for data analysis and presentation of market trends and insights.  The recruit will work in an experienced global team, providing support across our cybersecurity, data center infrastructure and networking services, as well as custom research projects. The primary role will involve data analysis and research, as well as working on a series of reports, presentations, databases, and client inquiries.  The role will be based out of our office in Bangalore, India (at least 40% of the time).  Main duties  As Market Research Analyst you will support our cybersecurity and infrastructure services research and will be expected to perform the following duties:    Working with the team to contribute toward global research needs, including databases, reports and projects, as well as keep up to date on industry trends.   Processing quarterly data, forecasting and analysis within Canalys’ Cybersecurity and Infrastructure research services as well as custom research projects.   Taking responsibility for reports on vendor performance, global market trends, macro-economic forces, etc.   Conducting face-to-face and desk research on areas of cybersecurity, networking, servers and storage.   Collecting and consolidating information across a range of supporting databases including financial results, key economic metrics and business demographics.   Engaging with clients, including presenting to clients on a regular basis, as well as responding to client inquiries.   Contributing to social media output highlighting Canalys research.   What makes a good candidate?  We are looking for someone with the following attributes:    Hunger: excited to learn about the technology industry and learn new skills.   Independent: learn by doing, proactively seeking guidance and using initiative to complete tasks.   Tech-focused: interested in technology and can demonstrate practical use.   Analytical: know how to work with data, in terms of collecting, processing and interpreting it.   Reliable: self-disciplined to meet deadlines and can multi-task.   Social: able to forge relationships with people face-to-face and virtually.   What is required of a candidate?  The candidate may be looking for their next role after 1-2 years of relevant experience preferably within a channel, IT networking, IT infrastructure or market research role.    A Bachelor’s Degree, preferably with a specialization in business, economics, statistics, mathematics, engineering, commerce and/or data science.   Excellent Microsoft Office skills, including Excel, PowerPoint and Word are essential.   Skills in data analysis, manipulation and visualization preferred. Experience with Power BI is a bonus.   Show a strong aptitude for technology. Be acquainted with current market trends and have a keen understanding of the future direction of the market.   Basic understanding of the company’s financial statements.   Knowledge of database tools such as Access or SQL will be a bonus.   Strong English language skills, both written and verbal are essential. Fluency in another language would be an advantage.   Ability to work both independently and in small teams.   Demonstrate an understanding of our company values of Accountability, Quality, Passion, Care, Being Flexible and Thinking Globally.   What does Canalys offer?  The company provides a range of benefits to its employees, including and not limited to a comprehensive medical claim & health insurance policy and variable performance bonus which are competitive and in-line with industry standards.  The successful applicant will join a global, fast-growing, and successful company with a relaxed, but hardworking and client-focused culture. We create a platform for innovation and offer an opportunity to become influential in the market. We operate a close-knit working environment, where everyone is treated with respect.  To apply  Send your resume with a covering letter highlighting why you are a good fit for this particular position, quoting reference ‘MRAC23INDIA’. Please address to the HR department and e-mail to jobs@canalys.com .  Canalys Company profile  Canalys is an independent analyst company with offices in four continents. We have over two decades of experience in guiding tier one tech vendor clients on the future of the technology industry and helping them think beyond the business models of the past. We deliver smart market insights to IT, channel and service provider professionals around the world. We stake our reputation on the quality of our data, our innovative use of technology and our high level of customer service.  Canalys offers a range of benefits to its employees, including comprehensive health insurance and performance-related bonuses. We also have a flexible and hybrid working policy, including allowing employees to work for four weeks of the year from anywhere in the world. More recently, Canalys has introduced free employee lunches on Thursdays.  Canalys is a globally integrated company. Promoting diversity of people and thoughts as well as equal opportunities has been critical to our success. Our values are partly about who we are but also about what we want to be as a company. We hire and promote people based on their ability to demonstrate them. Canalys is committed to encouraging equality, diversity and inclusion in our recruitment and workplace practices.

Role: Intern, Quantitative Research   Job Description  The Group: Morningstar’s Quantitative Research Group creates independent data-driven analytics designed to help achieve better outcomes by making better decisions. Our research encompasses variety of data sets across Operations Analytics (People, Sales & Marketing, Investor) and Financial Analytics. Working knowledge of AWS Data Engineering tools like Athena, Glue, EMR, DynamoDB is preferred.   Exposure with Agile software engineering practices.
